issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The creation of of ELB with LBCookieStickinessPolicy fails using CF templates.

Using demo-ha-lb.json -> Every resources get created properly.

Using bug-elb-cookie.json it fails as there is the LB Cookie policy.

comments.body: [~kedwards] [~jmille] the template is fine, the issue is that the data type for Cookie Expiration period is a java.lang.Long type and CF does not currently handle this type.
Sufficient to run bug-elb-cookie.json from the description to test the bug.  Should have a centos image installed and a keypair
